articles.description: Post-viral illnesses have often been neglected by science. Insights into Long COVID and myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (ME/CFS) show that this is the time to ramp up efforts.
articles.content: Long before 2020, governments and public health experts spent decades preparing for a pandemic along the lines of COVID-19. However, these models failed to anticipate that the virus would not only ki… [+8193 chars]

articles.title: Millions of older people don't get enough nutrients – how to spot it and what to do about it - The Conversation
articles.description: Want to stay active and healthy in later life? Food fortification and strength and balance training could help improve quality of life for older adults
